tool.name: Trinity Stats
tool.command: #if $input.ext.endswith(".gz") gunzip -c '$input' > input && #else ln -s '$input' input && #end if TrinityStats.pl input > $statsfile
tool.help:
Trinity_ assembles transcript sequences from Illumina RNA-Seq data. This tool computes basic statistics of the assembly (such as stats for genes, transcripts, reconstruction size and N metrics).
**Inputs**
It takes as input a transcriptome assembled with Trinity.
.. _Trinity: https://github.com/trinityrnaseq/trinityrnaseq/wiki
